item.description:
http://www.essexcruises.com/erc_p/tours.html Cost is $25.00 per person  and there is a cash bar on board!

A fun sunset river cruise!  We need at least 12 people to hold this - the boat holds 55, so the more the merrier!

Right now we need to see who is interested in attending...if we have enough people, we will post the info. on how to pay/reserve and, at that time, you will need to confirm.

Directions here... http://www.essexcruises.com/erc_p/directions.html

***UPDATE ABOUT PAYMENTS***

Hello all,

My contact at the Essex River Cruises informed me that they can start taking payments for our cruise this week (May 13th)!  The price is $25.00 and they accept all major credit cards.  When you call tell them that it is the June 28th 6:00pm sunset cruise for Meetup.  You can also mention my name, Kristin Smith.  Here is their phone number:

978-768-6981

Once you have paid please update your rsvp with the comment "paid." That way we will know our exact numbers.  We need at least 15 people from the three groups that were invited but we have room for up to 55 members.  Based on the feeback from Social Fun and Girlfriends of the North Shore, it looks like spots will go fast so make sure you call and reserve your spot!
item.name: Essex River Boat Cruise just for Meetup! Need min. 12 people - $25.00
